attributes.action: Ignore petitions for Abolishing  Daylight Saving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has been part of our culture for many a year. It is there for a reason. It does not mean we have less daylight - just SAFER daylight. The thought of children travelling to school in the dark, whilst tired, with tired, vision impaired drivers on the roads is madness! I can remember the 70's experiment - Not Good. It wasn't taken up for a reason. Please ignore the ignorance of people who haven't thought it through, or who use spurious environmental issues as an excuse, or worse still - think we actually, physically lose daylight!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
